author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sub Collector, Cheyyar T.Prabu Shankar had organised a special medical camp for the revenue officials in Cheyyar Revenue Division on Saturday.

About 190 revenue officials from Village Assistants to Tahsildars participated in the medical checkup held in the Indo American School in Cheyyar.

Doctors of different specialities including diabetes, cardiology, ENT and skin etc. examined patients in the camp. Doctors of the Siddha System of Medicine too participated in the camp.

At the beginning of the programme the participants were taught Yoga and breathing exercises.

Speaking to The Hindu , Dr.Prabu Shankar, a specialist in community medicine, said that the camp was organised since the revenue officials especially run the risk of acquiring non communicable diseases due to the nature of their work.
title: Medical camp for revenue officials
